comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: I thought debs were meant to wear white.  Is the pink one a fallen deb?

comment.author: 41077370@N05
comment._content: I suspect the lady in the front is in a pink frock due to the colourist getting carried away. It was very popular at the time for black and white images to be hand-tinted in colour but, as the person doing so was rarely, if ever, present when the original photograph was taken, sometimes the colour scheme could end up a little 'creative'.
